title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\ConsistentHashLoadBalancerSettings
name: ConsistentHashLoadBalancerSettings
description:
This message defines settings for a consistent hash style load balancer.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.ConsistentHashLoadBalancerSettings

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.http_cookie
params.description: Hash is based on HTTP Cookie. This field describes a HTTP cookie that will be used as the hash key for the consistent hash load balancer. If the cookie is not present, it will be generated. This field is applicable if the sessionAffinity is set to HTTP_COOKIE.

params.name: data.http_header_name
params.description: The hash based on the value of the specified header field. This field is applicable if the sessionAffinity is set to HEADER_FIELD.

params.name: data.minimum_ring_size
params.description: The minimum number of virtual nodes to use for the hash ring. Defaults to 1024. Larger ring sizes result in more granular load distributions. If the number of hosts in the load balancing pool is larger than the ring size, each host will be assigned a single virtual node.

methods.name: getMinimumRingSize
methods.description:
The minimum number of virtual nodes to use for the hash ring. Defaults to 1024. Larger ring sizes result in more granular load distributions. If the number of hosts in the load balancing pool is larger than the ring size, each host will be assigned a single virtual node.

Generated from protobuf field string minimum_ring_size = 234380735;
